law.text: The secretary shall adopt rules and regulations for the proper administration and enforcement of KRS 217.650 to 217.710. The secretary may in his discretion adopt tests and standards for determination of toxic, poisonous, corrosive, irritant, flammable, and radioactive properties of any hazardous substance.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art.VI, sec. 107(22). -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 244, sec. 5, effective June 16, 1960.
